General.Name: Meshek Energy-Renewable Energies Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Meshek Energy - Renewable Energies Ltd. engages in the renewable energy business. The company is involved in the initiation, construction, and operation of photovoltaic electricity generation facilities. Meshek Energy - Renewable Energies Ltd. was founded in 2016 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.
General.Address: Gaash Commercial Zone, Tel Aviv, Israel, 6095000
